column2: BrightSphere Investment Group, Inc. is a holding company, which engages in the provision of asset management services. The company is headquartered in Boston, Massachusetts and currently employs 960 full-time employees. The company is a global diversified asset management company. The firm through its subsidiaries BrightSphere Investment Group Plc, BrightSphre Inc, BrightSphere Holdings Ltd, and BrightSphere (Asia-Pacific) limited offers varieties of investment strategies to investors worldwide. The firm is focused on identifying and developing new strategies, including quantitatively-focused China A shares and a Multi-Asset Class capabilities. The firm is also engaged in developing product lines focused on global, international and emerging markets equities, and a suite of fixed income investments including bank loans.
